statements: DELETE FROM LiDARData WHERE classification = 'ground' AND x_coordinate > 100 AND y_coordinate < 50;
DELETE FROM topographic_analysis WHERE area_name = 'Mount Everest';
DELETE FROM lidar_data WHERE id = 1 AND longitude < -100.0
DELETE FROM topographic_analysis WHERE slope > 10 AND elevation_model = 'DEM'
DELETE FROM lidar_data WHERE elevation < 100 AND intensity > 0.5
DELETE FROM terrain_model WHERE model_name = 'Forest' AND model_description LIKE 'Detailed%'
DELETE FROM LiDAR_PointCloud WHERE project_id = 100 AND classification = 'ground';
DELETE FROM LiDAR_PointCloud WHERE project_id = 101 AND classification = 'building';
